Text:
thanks so much for this!!
i dont get the network where i live, and dont have any other way to see this show. you've made my day/week. i hope you continue to provide this series every week.
Thank you very much. I doubt we will get this here for a long time or at all. :)
Opens torrent file, sticks knife into it, licks the blade, nods. Yup, real Red Dwarf. Pure British comedy. High definition with no glitches and smooth playback.
